item.title: The Spritzes and Carbonaras That Ate Italy
item.description: Tourism has turned some Italian streets into monochromatic eating zones. Some officials have banned the opening of new restaurants.

item.title: Israeli Military Fires on Vehicle, Saying It Crossed Gaza Cease-Fire Line

item.title: Large Fire Disrupts Flights at Bangladesh’s Main Airport
item.description: The blaze drew dozens of firefighting units, with military help. Officials said they could not yet specify what caused it.
